      • getFileNamePattern

        public java.lang.String getFileNamePattern()
        Getter for fileNamePattern
        Returns:
        current value of fileNamepattern

      • setFileNamePattern

        public void setFileNamePattern(java.lang.String fileNamePattern)
        Setter for fileNamepattern
        Parameters:
        fileNamePattern - the name of the rolled-over (archived) log files.Its value should consist of the name of the file, plus a suitably placed %d conversion specifier. The %d conversion specifier may contain a date-and-time pattern as specified by the java.text.SimpleDateFormat class;Mandatory field to pass

      • getMaxHistory

        public int getMaxHistory()
        Getter for maxHistory
        Returns:
        current value of maxHistory

      • setMaxHistory

        public void setMaxHistory(int maxHistory)
        Setter for maxHistory
        Parameters:
        maxHistory - controls the maximum number of archive files to keep, asynchronously deleting older files;default this restriction will not apply

      • getTotalCap

        public java.lang.String getTotalCap()
        Getter for totalCap
        Returns:
        current value of totalCap

      • setTotalCap

        public void setTotalCap(java.lang.String totalCap)
        Setter for totalCap
        Parameters:
        totalCap - controls the total size of all archive files. Oldest archives are deleted asynchronously when the total size cap is exceeded;default this restriction will not apply

      • getMaxFileSize

        public java.lang.String getMaxFileSize()
        Getter for maxFileSize
        Returns:
        current value of maxFileSize

      • setMaxFileSize

        public void setMaxFileSize(java.lang.String maxFileSize)
        Setter for maxFileSize
        Parameters:
        maxFileSize - limit the size of each log file;default this restriction will not apply
